content.rendered:
Shining EinScan 3D Scanners

SHINING 3D’s Einscan 3D Scanner range focuses on the fusion and innovation between 3D digitizing and 3D printing technology. It provides integrated solutions of both equipment and services and applies them to a variety of areas including; industrial manufacturing, educational consumption, bio-medical treatment, etc.

With SHINING’s 3D digitizing technology integrated solutions have been successfully applied to numerous industries such as automobile manufacturing, aerospace, mould making, electric products, consumption goods, dentistry, orthopaedics, cultural relics, sculpture, construction, energy, scientific research, vocational education, etc. Helping customers increase efficiency in these industries, also increasing quality and reducing losses.

buy now Contact Us

Phone

03 9687 8638

Address

7A Kent St,
Yarraville, VIC 3013
Australia.

    Compare Einscan 3D scanner specifications

    HD H HX SP
    Accuracy ★★★★★
    Up to 0.045mm(handheld scan)
    0.04mm(fixed scan)    		 ★★★★
    Up to 0.05mm    		 ★★★★★
    Up to 0.04mm    		 ★★★★
    Up to 0.05mm
    Resolution ★★★★★
    0.2-3mm(handheld scan)
    0.24mm(fixed scan)    		 ★★★☆
    0.25-3mm    		 ★★★★★
    0.05-3mm
    Speed ★★★★★
    10 FPS 3,00,000 points/s
    (handheld hd scan)
    30 FPS 1,500,000 points/s
    (handheld rapid scan)    		 ★★★★★
    20 FPS 1,200,000 points/s
    (standard scan/body scan)
    20 FPS 720,000 points/s
    (face scan)    		 ★★★★★
    20 FPS 1,200,000 points/s
    (rapid scan)
    55 FPS 480,000 points/s
    (laser scan)
    Dark/shiny surface ★★★★ ★★★★ ★★★★★
    Suitable scan size 3cm-300cm 30cm-300cm 30cm-300cm
    Fixed scan scan Support with Industrial Pack No No
    Color Texture Support with Color Pack Yes（Built-in color camera） Yes(Rapid scan）(Built-in color camera)
    No (Laser scan)
    Light source LED LED, Infrared ray LED, Laser LED
    Link EinScan HD EinScan H EinScan HX EinScan SP

    Shining 3D Scanners in Australia

    The EinScan Pro 3D scanner from Shining 3D was a great product, and proved to be extremely popular in the Australian market. It’s handheld, easy to use and produced high quality scans producing results that beyond expectations for a scanner in it’s price range. This created a great base for Shining to build on to create even more powerful 3D Scanning solutions.

    Einscan 3D Scanners

    • Shining EinScan Pro HD 3D Scanner
      Exceptional versatility and powerful optimizations come together for the ultimate high-efficiency and professional level 3D scanning experience.
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan H 3D Scanner
      Built-in colour camera and large field of view, EinScan H provides high-quality 3D data with full colour,...
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan HX 3D Scanner
      High efficiency and reliable results give EinScan HX more application possibilities.
      Read More
    • Shining EinScan SP 3D Scanner
      Capture 3D Data Easier and Faster. Dual scan modes: Auto Scan and Fixed Scan. Wide scan range...
      Read More

    Want To Know More?

    Our team of 3D Scanning professionals are just an email or a phone call away.
